0101110100001010 0100111010010011 0 -> sum: 1010101110011101, cout: 0

0100101001101010 0000111111101100 0 -> sum: 0101101001010110, cout: 0
0010000100011010 0110011101111010 1 -> sum: 1000100010010101, cout: 0

0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
